name: Avoid unreferenced Programs  (Shell)
description: This rule searches all the unreferenced Shell Programs.
output:
The report lists all the  unreferenced Shell Programs

It provides following information: 
- Program full name
rationale: Unreferenced code may be the symptom of Dead Code. Dead Code must be avoided as it makes source code less readable and increases the cost of the software maintenance.
remediation: Try to reduce the number of unreferenced  Shell Programs.
